title: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry unable to instantiate using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource
description: Bug 22360[Fonts] The FontRegistry class in org.eclipse.jface.resource is unable to be instantiated using resources outside of the org.eclipse.jface.resource path. Currently, it only looks for resources relative to the location of the FontRegistry class. This issue could be resolved by allowing FontRegistry to take a client class or class loader as an additional parameter in the constructor.
OB: The FontRegistry class should be able to load resources outside of the org.eclipse.jface.resource path.
EB: Alternatively, the FontRegistry class could provide a way for clients to load their own resource bundle and pass it as a parameter to the constructor, instead of relying on the name of the bundle.
